betterquesting:10.desc:8:
True, the Twilight Horde has not been defeated yet, but this blow did have a positive effect!
The bees were able to take away and mimic some of the soul manipulation powers from the Experienced Cori, and are now studying ways to use it for good. Well, whatever definition of 'good' they may have.
They are responsible for the current state of Apichisi, after all...
betterquesting:10.name:8: Soul-Sucking, Just like Streaming on Twitch
